# BittaLethalPack [![version](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)](https://github.com/Jatc252/BittaLethalPack)
Compilation of some mods for Lethal Company by [Jatc251](https://jatc251.com)

## Mods
- BepInExPack
- MoreCompany
- FlashlightToggle
- HDLethalCompany
- WalkieUse
- ItemQuickSwitch
- LetMeLookDown
- LateCompany
- More_Suits
- Boombox_Controller
